entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pokemonId` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `imageUrl` TEXT NOT NULL, `isFavourite` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`pokemonId`))

indices.name: index_Pokemon_pokemonId
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Pokemon_pokemonId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pokemonId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pokemonAbilityId` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `pokemonId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`pokemonAbilityId`), FOREIGN KEY(`pokemonId`) REFERENCES `Pokemon`(`pokemonId`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_PokemonAbility_pokemonAbilityId
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_PokemonAbility_pokemonAbilityId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pokemonAbilityId`)

indices.name: index_PokemonAbility_pokemonId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_PokemonAbility_pokemonId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pokemonId`)
